attributes.action: Hold a referendum on the recently signed EU Treaty/Constitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As with the initial joining of the Eu (then The Common Market) the British people have been misled with this latest 'Treaty', the Mastricht Treaty and the Single European Act. We do not accept the laws being imposed upon us by the EU as they do not reflect the will of the people. We accept the need for trading agreements and no other.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
